name: untitled (itch) (Ding-Hobba)
description:
(In the interest of good habits and our sanities, we returned to a very old and broken project and finished it - more or less.)

Bounce your way out of the dungeon in this arcade-style platformer!

Use the windows to climb higher and avoid falling to your death.

  • 🔪🟣 Watch out for weapons and magic missiles
  • 🟢 Pickup orbs to refill your health

____________________________________________________________________

Keyboard Controls:

  • Move: WASD/Arrow Keys

Gamepad:

  • Move: Left Stick/D-Pad

____________________________________________________________________

Thanks for playing!
